name: Motris
description:
Motris plays like tetris, but instead of rotating the pieces, you have to modify them by altering their shape before they hit the ground.

Controls:

[A] / [D]Move Falling Shape Left / Right
[SPACE] / [S]Accelerate falling speed
Drag in Right PanelModify the falling shape. You can only move entire rows or columns.

Destroy multiple rows at once for higher scores.

Made by two people during the semestergamejam within 42 hours. The Topic of the Jam was "Modification".
